code: import React from'react';import{Card,ListGroup}from'react-bootstrap';import{useData}from'../contexts/DataContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Alerts=()=>{const{alerts,loading}=useData();const getAlertClass=severity=>{switch(severity){case'high':return'list-group-item-danger';case'medium':return'list-group-item-warning';case'low':return'list-group-item-info';default:return'list-group-item-light';}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Header,{className:"d-flex justify-content-between align-items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{className:"mb-0",children:"Alertas del Sistema"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"badge bg-danger",children:alerts?alerts.length:0})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Body,{className:"p-0",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListGroup,{variant:"flush",children:loading&&(!alerts||alerts.length===0)?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListGroup.Item,{className:"text-center text-muted",children:"Cargando alertas..."}):alerts&&alerts.length>0?alerts.map(alert=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListGroup.Item,{className:"".concat(getAlertClass(alert.severity)," alert-item"),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-flex justify-content-between",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h6",{className:"mb-1",children:alert.type}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"mb-1 small",children:alert.message})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-end",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("small",{className:"text-muted",children:alert.timestamp}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mt-1",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"badge bg-secondary",children:alert.packageId})})]})]})},alert.id)):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListGroup.Item,{className:"text-center text-muted",children:"No hay alertas activas"})})})]});};export default Alerts;
